name: Jigsaw Solitaire Christmas
description:
You like jigsaw games and solitaire? This game combines the two to bring you a new original jigsaw puzzle idea! How many tries will it take you to complete the challenge??

The puzzle pieces come out like a deck of cards and you cycle through them. If you get stuck you can skip or get hints, to keep it in the fun zone :)

This series brings you 15 beautiful photographs of seasonal joy. Happy Holidays from Puzzlepups!

FEATURES:
Original jigsaw puzzle idea accompanied by beautiful photography and relaxing music
15 gorgeous winter holidays photographs
Many hours of game play with multiple jigsaws to conquer
Several difficulty levels, from trained baby to extreme
Game works in both portrait and landscape mode
